statistic.title: Collections by type
statistic.sql: select ca_l_i.item_value as "collection type", count(*) as "number" from ca_collections ca_c left join ca_list_items ca_l_i on ca_c.type_id=ca_l_i.item_id and ca_l_i.parent_id is not null left join ca_lists ca_l on ca_l.list_id=ca_l_i.list_id where ca_c.deleted=0 group by ca_l_i.item_id order by 2 desc

statistic.title: Collection creation by month this year
statistic.sql: SELECT year(FROM_UNIXTIME(cal.log_datetime)) AS year, monthname(FROM_UNIXTIME(cal.log_datetime)) as month, concat(count(DISTINCT logged_row_id)) as creation FROM `ca_change_log` cal where cal.logged_table_num=13 and changetype="I" and year(NOW()) = year(FROM_UNIXTIME(cal.log_datetime)) GROUP BY year,month ORDER BY year,month(FROM_UNIXTIME(cal.log_datetime))

statistic.title: Collection creation by month last year
statistic.sql: SELECT year(FROM_UNIXTIME(cal.log_datetime)) AS year, monthname(FROM_UNIXTIME(cal.log_datetime)) as month, concat(count(DISTINCT logged_row_id)) as creation FROM `ca_change_log` cal where cal.logged_table_num=13 and changetype="I" and year(NOW()) - 1 = year(FROM_UNIXTIME(cal.log_datetime)) GROUP BY year,month ORDER BY year,month(FROM_UNIXTIME(cal.log_datetime))

statistic.title: Collections by status
statistic.sql: SELECT ca_li.idno as Status, count(ca_col.collection_id) as Number FROM ca_collections ca_col LEFT JOIN ca_list_items ca_li ON ca_li.item_value = ca_col.status LEFT JOIN ca_lists ca_l ON ca_li.list_id=ca_l.list_id WHERE ca_l.list_code='workflow_statuses' and ca_li.item_value!="Root" and ca_col.deleted = 0 group by ca_li.item_value

statistic.title: Collections by access
statistic.sql: SELECT ca_li.idno as Access, count(ca_col.collection_id) as Number FROM ca_collections ca_col LEFT JOIN ca_list_items ca_li ON ca_li.item_value = ca_col.access LEFT JOIN ca_lists ca_l ON ca_li.list_id=ca_l.list_id WHERE ca_l.list_code='access_statuses' and ca_li.item_value!="Root" and ca_col.deleted = 0 group by ca_li.item_value

statistic.title: Deleted collections
statistic.sql: SELECT IF(deleted>0,"yes","no") as "Deleted", count(collection_id) as Number FROM ca_collections GROUP BY deleted
